org.agreement_technologies.common.map_parser

Interface PDDLParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MAPDDLParserImp, ParserImp

    public interface PDDLParser
    PDDLParser interface provides methods to parse PDDL files.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentList createEmptyAgentList()
      Returns an empty agents list.
      boolean isMAPDDL(java.lang.String domainFile)
      Checks if the format of the input files is MAPDDL.
      AgentList parseAgentList(java.lang.String agentsFile)
      Parses a file with the list of participating agents.
      Task parseDomain(java.lang.String domainFile)
      Parses a PDDL domain file.
      void parseProblem(java.lang.String problemFile, Task planningTask, AgentList agList, java.lang.String agentName)
      Parses a PDDL problem file.

    • Method Detail

      • parseDomain

        Task parseDomain(java.lang.String domainFile)
                 throws java.text.ParseException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Parses a PDDL domain file.
        Parameters:
        domainFile - Domain file name
        Returns:
        Parsed task
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If a parse error is detected
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read
        Since:
        1.0

      • parseProblem

        void parseProblem(java.lang.String problemFile,
                Task planningTask,
                AgentList agList,
                java.lang.String agentName)
                  throws java.text.ParseException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Parses a PDDL problem file. Domain should have been parsed before.
        Parameters:
        problemFile - Problem file name
        planningTask - Parsed task
        agList - List of participating agents
        agentName - Name of this planning agent
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If a parse error is detected
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read
        Since:
        1.0

      • isMAPDDL

        boolean isMAPDDL(java.lang.String domainFile)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if the format of the input files is MAPDDL.
        Parameters:
        domainFile - Domain file name
        Returns:
        true, if the input file is in MAPDDL format; false, if it is the native FMAP-PDDL format.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read
        Since:
        1.0

      • parseAgentList

        AgentList parseAgentList(java.lang.String agentsFile)
                         throws java.text.ParseException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Parses a file with the list of participating agents.
        Parameters:
        agentsFile - Agents' file name
        Returns:
        List of agents
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If a parse error is detected
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read
        Since:
        1.0

      • createEmptyAgentList

        AgentList createEmptyAgentList()
        Returns an empty agents list.
        Returns:
        Empty agents list
        Since:
        1.0
